Title....: Smokey and the Bandit
IMDb......: http://imdblight.com/id/aXsOenlcBENifXQE-Smokey_and_the_Bandit
Genres...: Comedy, Action, Crime
Year.....: 1977
Rating...: 6.4/10 with 7,860 ratings
Plot.....: Bandit and Cledus are two truck-driving southerners who accept a dare from big-shots Big and Little Enos to pick up a truckload of beer from Texas and return it to them within a specified amount of time. Picking it up is simple enough, but as they are leaving Texas, Bandit unwittingly picks up Carrie, a hitchhiking bride-to-be who just left her groom, Junior, at the altar. Junior, however, is the son of Sheriff Buford T. Justice. And when Buford and Junior discover what has happened, they go on a "high-speed pursuit" across the Southeast to catch the bandit.
Runtime..: 96 minutes
Filmed in: USA
Language.: English

Title....: Smokey and the Bandit II
IMDb......: http://imdblight.com/id/aXsOeHpiAENifXQE-Smokey_and_the_Bandit_II
Genres...: Comedy, Action, Crime
Year.....: 1980
Rating...: 4.5/10 with 2,602 ratings
Plot.....: It's been a few years since Cletus and the Bandit made their famous 28-hour run to Texas for a few cases of Coors. Bandit is now a washed-up has-been living in the past, until Big Enos and Little Enos make him another offer: Transport a live Elephant across country in 3 days or less.
Runtime..: 100 minutes
Filmed in: USA
Language.: English
